title: FRIDAY 2/12 - Tom Brady to have surgery
itunes:title: FRIDAY 2/12 - Tom Brady to have surgery
description:
Buccaneers head coach Tom Brady (0:09) will undergo minor knee surgery after playing with discomfort for most of the season. Could Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson *0:33)be on the move? Plus, Matthew Stafford talks about his desire to play in the playoffs with the Rams (1:22)
